alert.note: Alert for Rock (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 21 at 9:30PM CDT until September 21 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Runoff from earlier heavy rainfall will likely continue to produce minor flooding in the advisory area for the next 1 to 2 hours. * WHERE...A portion of north central Nebraska, including the following counties, Holt and Rock. * WHEN...Until 1015 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 926 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Bassett, Newport and Twin Lakes State Wildlife Management Area. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
